weak_ptr.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_SERIALIZATION_WEAK_PTR_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_WEAK_PTR_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // shared_ptr.hpp: serialization for boost shared pointer
00011 
00012 // (C) Copyright 2004 Robert Ramey and Martin Ecker
00013 // Use, modification and distribution is subject to the Boost Software
00014 // License, Version 1.0. (See accompanying file LICENSE_1_0.txt or copy at
00015 // http://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt)
00016

00018 
00019 #include <boost/weak_ptr.hpp>
00020 #include <boost/serialization/shared_ptr.hpp>
00021 
00022 namespace boost {
00023 namespace serialization{
00024 
00025 template<class Archive, class T>
00026 inline void save(
00027     Archive & ar,
00028     const boost::weak_ptr<T> &t,
00029     const unsigned int /* file_version */
00030 ){
00031     const boost::shared_ptr<T> sp = t.lock();
00032         ar << boost::serialization::make_nvp("shared_ptr", sp);
00033 }
00034 
00035 template<class Archive, class T>
00036 inline void load(
00037     Archive & ar,
00038     boost::weak_ptr<T> &t,
00039     const unsigned int /* file_version */
00040 ){
00041     boost::shared_ptr<T> sp;
00042         ar >> boost::serialization::make_nvp("shared_ptr", sp);
00043     t = sp;
00044 }
00045 
00046 template<class Archive, class T>
00047 inline void serialize(
00048     Archive & ar,
00049     boost::weak_ptr<T> &t,
00050     const unsigned int file_version
00051 ){
00052     boost::serialization::split_free(ar, t, file_version);
00053 }
00054 
00055 } // namespace serialization
00056 } // namespace boost
00057 
00058 #endif // BOOST_SERIALIZATION_WEAK_PTR_HPP
